text: Igor Bortnitsky (born 13 June 1964) is a Soviet rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Unified Team Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Igor Bortnitsky
